name: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Movie: The Game: The First Chapter Of The Buff Sonic Chronicles
name_original: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Movie: The Game: The First Chapter Of The Buff Sonic Chronicles
description:
NOTE: This game was originally made for RAGE 2019. The theme was the upcoming Sonic the Hedgehog movie.

In this thrilling chapter of the Buff Sonic Chronicles, Buff Sonic befriends Officer Burpo and takes on the nefarious Dr. Eggman (played by Jim Carrey). Will Buff Sonic save the day? Why is Green Hill suddenly a small town in the middle of nowhere? How did Sonic get so buff anyway? At least one of these questions will be answered in this chapter.

CREDITS

Police car from http://clipart-library.com/clipart/1022185.htm

Green Hill Zone: Green Hill Zone - Sonic Blast (Kojiro Mikusa)
fast: fast - fast (fast)
Boss: Boss - Stip (Faried Verheul)
Final boss cutscene: You Idiot - Undertale (Toby Fox)
Final boss: Final level - Atlantis: The Lost Empire (Jake Kaufman)

Be on the look out for Chapter 2 of the Buff Sonic Chronicles, coming Soon™!
